name: CRAWFORD COUNTY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD and AFSCME, District Council 85, AFL-CIO, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Crawford County v. Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board
docket_number: Appeal No. 067 Western District Appeal Docket 1995

judges: Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
NIX, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: CRAWFORD COUNTY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD and AFSCME, District Council 85, AFL-CIO, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Vicki L. Beatty, for Crawford County.
Peter Lassi, for PA Labor Relations Board.
Alaine S. Williams, Philadelphia, for Appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
672 A.2d 1318
CRAWFORD COUNTY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD and AFSCME, District Council 85, AFL-CIO, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.
Argued March 6, 1996.
Decided March 18, 1996.
Vicki L. Beatty, for Crawford County.
Peter Lassi, for PA Labor Relations Board.
William Haller, for AFSCME.
Alaine S. Williams, Philadelphia, for Appellees.
Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
